verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Turn your ear to heaven and hear the noise inside newline The sond of angel's awe, the sound of angel's song

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And all this for a King, we could join and sing newline All to Christ our King

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh praise Him, oh, praise Him newline He is holy, He is Holy

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Turn your gaze to heaven and raise a joyous noise newline The sound of salvation come, the sound of rescued ones

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: All this for a king, angels join to sing newline All for Christ our King

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Alleluia, (4x) newline Alleluia, alleluia, He is holy, He is holy
